name: Execute some hook before scenario

testSteps.description: Given some scenario with some before hook
When an exception happens during hook execution
Then the steps should have status Ignored
But the scenario should be reported as Failing

userStory.storyName: Exceptions in cucumber hooks must result in failed scenario execution

featureTag.name: Exceptions in cucumber hooks must result in failed scenario execution

title: Execute some hook before scenario

tags.name: Exceptions in cucumber hooks must result in failed scenario execution

testFailureCause.message: Oops! Some exception happened during hook execution!

testFailureMessage: Oops! Some exception happened during hook execution!
testFailureSummary: ERROR;java.lang.RuntimeException;Oops! Some exception happened during hook execution!;TestHooks.java
